block, chances are there might be lesser records in one of the blocks, so we need to account for this\nvar recordsProcessed \u003d fd_data.flow_var.records_processed + \n (parseInt(fd_data.subflow_inputs.max_parallel_blocks_to_run) * parseInt(fd_data.subflow_inputs.max_records_per_block));\n\nif (recordsProcessed \u003e fd_data.flow_var.total_records_in_simulation_run)\n recordsProcessed \u003d fd_data.flow_var.total_records_in_simulation_run;\n\nreturn recordsProcessed;"}}</script>
